data.name: Railroad Ink Challenge – Desert
data.detailed_description:
Grow cacti in the arid desert climate!


An extremely hot journey
Build oases next to cacti to protect them before the next heat wave appears, or they will be destroyed by the harsh desert climate. The more cacti survive, the more points you make!
data.about_the_game:
Grow cacti in the arid desert climate!


An extremely hot journey
Build oases next to cacti to protect them before the next heat wave appears, or they will be destroyed by the harsh desert climate. The more cacti survive, the more points you make!
data.short_description: Build oases next to cacti to protect them before the next heat wave appears, or they will be destroyed by the harsh desert climate. The more cacti survive, the more points you make!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel 1.6 GHz single core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
